_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Quake Live with minqlx
author: patz.michael@gmail.com
description: Quake Live is a first-person shooter video game by id Software. It is an updated version of Quake III Arena that was originally designed as a free-to-play game launched via a web browser plug-in. On September 17, 2014, the game was re-launched as a standalone title on Steam.
startup: ./run_server_x64_minqlx.sh +set net_port "{{SERVER_PORT}}" +set sv_hostname "{{SERVER_NAME}}" +set sv_serverType "{{SERVER_TYPE}}" +set g_password "{{PASSWORD}}" +sv_fps "{{FPS}}" +set g_gametype "{{G_GAMETYPE}}" +set qlx_redisAddress "{{REDIS_HOST}}" +set qlx_redisPort "{{REDIS_PORT}}" +set qlx_redisPassword "{{REDIS_PASSWORD}}" +set qlx_owner "{{QLX_OWNER}}" +set qlx_plugins "{{QLX_PLUGINS}}" +set qlx_redisDatabase "{{REDIS_DATABASE}}"

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Quake Live with minqlx Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
export DISPLAY=
export PYTHON_KEYRING_BACKEND=keyring.backends.null.Keyring
export PIP_ROOT_USER_ACTION=ignore

apt -y update

ln -fs /usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Madrid /etc/localtime
apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends tzdata
dpkg-reconfigure -f noninteractive tzdata

apt install -y software-properties-common apt-utils
add-apt-repository --yes ppa:deadsnakes/ppa

apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install locales curl lib32gcc1 ca-certificates libstdc++6 libz1 python3.9 python3.9-dev python3-dev wget redis-server git build-essential python3.9-distutils libpython3.9-dev python3-pip

locale-gen --purge en_US.UTF-8
echo -e 'LANG="en_US.UTF-8"\nLANGUAGE="en_US:en"\n' > /etc/default/locale

/etc/init.d/redis-server start
redis-cli ping

cd /tmp


#curl https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py -o get-pip.py
#python3.9 get-pip.py
#rm get-pip.py

pip3 install redis --no-input
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz http://media.steampowered.com/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd /mnt/server/logs
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt

export HOME=/mnt/server
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login anonymous +app_update 349090 +quit

mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

#minqlx
cd /mnt/server
rm -rf minqlx
git clone https://github.com/MinoMino/minqlx.git
cd minqlx
make
cp -r bin/* /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

#minqlx plugins
rm -rf /mnt/server/minqlx-plugins
git clone https://github.com/MinoMino/minqlx-plugins.git
pip3 install -v -r minqlx-plugins/requirements.txt --no-input --user

# adding extra plugins
cd /mnt/server/minqlx-plugins

# branding
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tjone270/Quake-Live/master/minqlx-plugins/branding.py

#centerprint
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dsverdlo/minqlx-plugins/master/centerprint.py

#commands
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/BarelyMiSSeD/minqlx-plugins/blob/master/commands.py

#discordbot
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/roasticle/minqlx-plugins/blob/master/discordbot.py

#commlink
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tjone270/Quake-Live/master/minqlx-plugins/commlink.py

#fragstats
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mgaertne/minqlx-plugin-tests/master/src/main/python/frag_stats.py

#elocheck
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mgaertne/minqlx-plugin-tests/master/src/main/python/elocheck.py

#midair
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/x0rnn/minqlx-plugins/master/midair.py

#onjoin
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tjone270/Quake-Live/master/minqlx-plugins/onjoin.py

#midair_only
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/x0rnn/minqlx-plugins/master/midair_only.py

#mydiscordbot
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mgaertne/minqlx-plugin-tests/master/src/main/python/mydiscordbot.py

#myessentials
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dsverdlo/minqlx-plugins/master/myessentials.py

#myfun (replacement for fun.py)
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/BarelyMiSSeD/minqlx-plugins/master/myFun/myFun.py

#playerinfo
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dsverdlo/minqlx-plugins/master/player_info.py

#pummel
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mattiZed/minqlx-plugins/master/pummel.py

#q3resolver
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tjone270/Quake-Live/master/minqlx-plugins/q3resolver.py

#stats
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/x0rnn/minqlx-plugins/master/stats.py

#specs
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/x0rnn/minqlx-plugins/master/specs.py

#sv_fps
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tjone270/Quake-Live/master/minqlx-plugins/sv_fps.py

#thirtysecwarn
wget https://github.com/mgaertne/minqlx-plugin-tests/blob/master/src/main/python/thirtysecwarn.py

#translate
wget https://github.com/dsverdlo/minqlx-plugins/blob/master/translate.py

#uberstats
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/roasticle/minqlx-plugins/master/uberstats.py

#votestats
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tjone270/Quake-Live/master/minqlx-plugins/votestats.py

# TODO
# - Install requirements (python) for selected plugins
# - setup plugins one by one as some requires customisation
# - setup workshop for sounds and extra maps

echo "Finished!"

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: The Name that will show up in the Serverbrowser

variables.name: Server Password
variables.description: Set a server-wide password, and stop all users from connecting without it

variables.name: FPS
variables.description: Change how many frames the server runs per second. WARNING: Has not been tested extensively, and will have a direct impact on CPU and network usage!

variables.name: Game Type
variables.description:
0 = Free for All
1 = Tournament
2 = Race
3 = Team Deathmatch
4 = Clan Arena
5 = Capture the Flag
6 = One-Flag CTF
7 = Overload
8 = Harvester
9 = Freeze Tag

variables.name: Redis host
variables.description:
minqlx makes use of redis. You already have a Redis server instance running at pterodactyl host so you need to edit host's /etc/redis/redis.conf and set

bind 0.0.0.0
set protectedMode no
requirepass yourpassword 

...and maybe reset ufw with sudo ufw reset

You need to set that password for pterodactyl to work so edit /var/www/pterodactyl/.env and set the new redis password. Otherwise pterodactyl panel will stop working.

172.18.0.1 is the host's ip from within a container, so you might not need to change it.

variables.name: qlx_owner
variables.description: steamID64 of the owner. Get yours at https://www.steamidfinder.com/

variables.name: qlx plugins
variables.description:
A comma-separated list of plugins that should be loaded at launch.
    Default: plugin_manager, essentials, motd, permission, ban, silence, clan, names, log, workshop, balance, fun
https://github.com/MinoMino/minqlx-plugins
variables.default_value: plugin_manager, essentials, motd, permission, ban, silence, clan, names, log, workshop, balance, fun

variables.name: Redis database
variables.description: id of the redis db used for minqlx stats. Default 1 as 0 is used for pterodactyl
